extracted_playbook.title: Review Logs for IP Addresses
extracted_playbook.description: Review available logs for IP addresses in Table 10 for indications of traffic with your organizationâ€™s network in the provided timeframes.

extracted_playbook.title: Review Indicators for Historical Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Review the indicators in Table 11 to identify historical activity or incidents which may have previously been identified by your organization.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Patches for Specific CVEs
extracted_playbook.description: Apply patches and/or mitigations for CVE-2024-3400, CVE-2022-1388, CVE-2019-19781, and CVE-2023-3519.

extracted_playbook.condition: Has the network already been compromised?

extracted_playbook.title: Investigate Use of Stolen Credentials
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct additional investigation into the use of stolen credentials (e.g., via the webshell on Netscaler devices) to identify threat actor attempts to establish footholds on other parts of the network.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Systems for Unique Identifiers and TTPs
extracted_playbook.description: Check your systems for the unique identifiers and TTPs used by the actors when operating on compromised networks, including creation of specific usernames, use of NGROK and Ligolo, and deployment of webshells in specific directories.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Systems for Outbound Web Requests
extracted_playbook.description: Check your systems for outbound web requests to files.catbox[.]moe and ***.ngrok[.]io.
